text.div:
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..*Extension
extension 2..*Extension
extension:ReviewedBy 0..1Extension
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"ReviewedBy"
value[x] 0..1(Slice Definition)Slice: Unordered, Open by type:$this
valueReference 0..1Reference(Practitioner)
extension:ReviewDate S1..1Extension
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"ReviewDate"
value[x] 0..1date
extension:ChangedFlag S1..1Extension
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"ChangedFlag"
value[x] 0..1boolean
extension:CarePlanChangeReason S0..1Extension
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"CarePlanChangeReason"
value[x] 0..1(Slice Definition)Slice: Unordered, Open by type:$this
valueCodeableConcept 0..1CodeableConceptBinding: Care Plan Change Reason Value Set (required)
extension:CommentOrDescription 0..1Extension
extension 0..0
url 1..1uri"CommentOrDescription"
value[x] 0..1string
url 1..1uri"http://mcodeinitiative.org/codex/us/icare/StructureDefinition/icare-care-plan-review"
value[x] 0..0

Documentation for this format

name: CarePlanReview
publisher: The MITRE Corporation and Alliance Foundation Trials
description:
Documentation of a re-assessment of the Care Plan, which may or may not lead to a revision of the plan. The fact the assessment has been conducted should be documented even when the Care Plan is not changed.
Implementation note: A ReasonCode is required when ChangedFlag is true.

element.definition: An Extension

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
element.comment: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition SHALL be a URI for the Structure Definition defining the extension.

element.definition: Value of extension - must be one of a constrained set of the data types (see [Extensibility](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extensibility.html) for a list).
